title: Typhoon T1: Open Thai Reasoning Model
summary: An open Thai reasoning model (research preview) exploring test-time reasoning strategies and instruction-following for Thai language tasks.

title: BenchING: Structured Output Benchmark for LLMs
summary: A benchmark and framework for evaluating how well LLMs follow structured output formats in narrative PCG tasks, with error taxonomy and scaling analysis.

title: Thai Earthquake Timeline Visualizer
summary: Interactive timeline visualizer for Thailand earthquake events with filtering and temporal context.

title: Typhoon Application Week
summary: Built and shipped 7+ web apps integrating LLM capabilities as part of a rapid prototyping initiative.

title: Multiverse of Greatness: Story Branching with LLMs
summary: Algorithms and tools for generating and evaluating branching storylines using LLMs, including UI and utilities.

title: Driving Assistant for Simulator-Based Assessment
summary: Low-latency speech assistant using pre-generated LLM messages to guide drivers in simulator-based assessment.

title: Prompt Engineering for Game Content Generation
summary: Open tutorials and notebooks demonstrating prompt engineering techniques for generating game content.

title: Multi-modal LLM Anomaly Detection
summary: Explorations in anomaly detection using multi-modal LLM pipelines.

title: Dashcam Driving Video Generation with CARLA
summary: Synthetic dashcam-style driving dataset generation using CARLA for downstream tasks.

title: ChatGPT4PCG Competition Platform
summary: Competition and infrastructure exploring LLM abilities for physics-constrained content generation with stability and similarity metrics.

title: Ultra: AR Poster Showcase Platform
summary: Web-based platform showcasing augmented reality posters for academic events.

title: Thai Learning
summary: A simple site for learning basic Thai language phrases and vocabulary.

title: Poster Showcase Websites
summary: Lightweight poster showcase sites for academic courses and events.

title: Krathu-500
summary: A research dataset/tooling project (500+ items) supporting downstream NLP/LLM work.

title: Coeus: Mind Map Generation from Text
summary: Platform integrating NLP techniques to generate mind maps from un/structured text.

title: Zeus: Interactive Physics Simulation
summary: Interactive physics simulation platform built as a collaborative project.

title: navi: Event Companion with AR Guidance
summary: Event companion mobile app featuring AR map guidance.

title: GDSC/GDGoC Lead (KMUTT)
summary: Inaugural Thai Google Developer Student Clubs (now GDGoC) lead at KMUTT, organizing workshops and developer community events.

title: KMUTT COVID-19 Support Platform
summary: A platform to support and manage donation requests during COVID-19.

title: TravelAloha (Agoda‑clone)
summary: Full‑stack web application inspired by Agoda, implemented as a course project.

title: Junior Programmer Camp XV
summary: Event websites and grading tools for a university programming camp.

title: Announce Message
summary: Socket.io‑based big screen message broadcaster for events.

title: SIT Code 2019
summary: Main website and registration system for a high school coding competition hosted by the university.

title: MedU
summary: Mobile app for research participants to collect biometric health data.

title: NewsHub
summary: Android RSS reader application with category feeds and offline reading.
